subject: Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Siena Coach Fran McCaffery, who had two years left on his contract, announced that he had signed an eight-year deal. The terms were not released. Athletic Director John D’Argenio said in a statement that he was pleased McCaffery and the college had reached an agreement. The Saints have won two straight Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference championships. They lost to Louisville in the second round of this year’s N.C.A.A. tournament.
